name: Pinball VR Classic
summary: Experience digital pinball as never before in Pinball VR Classic, a groundbreaking new pinball game from the digital pinball pioneers at Zen Studios! Pinball VR Classic features advanced physics, detailed 3D graphics, original table designs, and a robust set of social features and scoreboards making for an engaging VR experience you won’t find elsewhere. Pinball VR Classic replicates the atmosphere of real-life pinball machines in a virtual play space, while presenting gameplay features and effects that...
